keyword.name: vantageUrl
keyword.info: The remote Vantage web service URL

keyword.name: localWsPort
keyword.info: The port for listening to notifications from Vantage

keyword.name: vantageWsConnectTimeout
keyword.info: The JAX-WS connectTimeout value for communication with Vantage / milliseconds

keyword.name: vantageWsRequestTimeout
keyword.info: The JAX-WS requestTimeout value for communication with Vantage / milliseconds

keyword.name: vantageJobSubmitTimeout
keyword.info: Ultimate timeout for workflow job submit / milliseconds

keyword.name: vantageRetrySubmitInterval
keyword.info: The job submit retry interval / milliseconds

keyword.name: vantagePollStatusInterval
keyword.info: The job status update interval / milliseconds

keyword.name: vantageFineGrainedProgress
keyword.info: Enable calculation of precise progress based on progress of individual actions

keyword.name: jobRetainPeriod
keyword.info: How long to retain job status for the info-centre after the job has ended / minutes

keyword.name: enableHttpLogging
keyword.info: Enable logging of local WSDL-based web service handling

keyword.name: type
keyword.comment: The runner type identification: type {type}. No default

keyword.name: runnerMaximumRunnable
keyword.info: The number of concurrent jobs permitted
